The 21st Lux Style Awards were held on 24 November 2022 in Lahore, Pakistan.
Winners and nominees
The nominations were announced on 23 November 2022.
Film
{| class=wikitable style="width=100%"
|-
! colspan="2" style="width=50%"|Best Film
|-
| colspan=2 valign="top" |
* Khel Khel Mein
** Kahay Dil Jidhar
** Sheenogai
|-
!style="width=50%"|Best Film Actor
!style="width=50%"|Best Film Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
* Bilal Abbas Khan - Khel Khel Mein
** Junaid Khan - Kahay Dil Jidhar
** Faizan Sheikh - Udham Patakh
| valign="top"|
* Sajal Ali - Khel Khel Mein
** Mansha Pasha - Kahay Dil Jidhar
** Marina Syed - Sheenogai
|-
! colspan="2" style="width=50%"|Best Film Song
|-
| colspan=2 valign="top" |
* "Nayi Soch" from Khel Khel Mein - Shuja Haider, Jabir Abbas, Nida Hussain, Fabiha Hashmi, Maria, Panah, Shehryar & Safeer
** "Mastam" from Kahay Dil Jidhar
|}
